results.title: Abridge - LinkedIn
results.content:
Overview:
Abridge was founded in 2018 with the mission of powering deeper understanding in healthcare. Our Best in KLAS AI-powered platform was purpose-built for medical conversations, improving clinical documentation efficiencies while enabling clinicians to focus on what matters most—their patients. Our enterprise-grade technology transforms patient-clinician conversations into structured clinical notes in real-time, with deep EMR integrations. Powered by Linked Evidence and our purpose-built, auditable AI, we are the only company that maps AI-generated summaries to ground truth, helping providers quickly trust and verify the output. As pioneers in generative AI for healthcare, we are setting the industry standards for the responsible deployment of AI across health systems.

Website: https://www.abridge.com/
Crunchbase Url: https://www.crunchbase.com/organization/abridge-d1a4?utm_source=linkedin&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=linkedin_companies&utm_content=profile_cta_anon&trk=funding_crunchbase

results.title: Abridge AI Inc. Executive Team and Leadership Overview - Exa
results.content: Abridge AI Inc. is a leading healthcare technology company founded in 2018, specializing in AI-driven solutions that convert patient-clinician conversations into structured clinical notes. This diverse expertise drives Abridge AI Inc.'s mission to integrate advanced technology into clinical settings, while fostering a culture of innovation, operational excellence, and positive impact in healthcare. As CEO and Co-Founder of Abridge AI Inc., Shivdev Rao leads the company in developing advanced AI technology for healthcare documentation, championing solutions that empower clinicians and improve patient engagement at scale. The Abridge AI Inc. leadership team brings together clinical insight, advanced AI research, and operational excellence to pioneer healthcare documentation transformation. Together, the Abridge AI Inc. management team and founders have positioned the company as a leader in healthcare technology.

Abridge AI Inc. Executive Team and Leadership Overview - Exa
Abridge AI Inc. is a leading healthcare technology company founded in 2018, specializing in AI-driven solutions that convert patient-clinician conversations into structured clinical notes. This diverse expertise drives Abridge AI Inc.'s mission to integrate advanced technology into clinical settings, while fostering a culture of innovation, operational excellence, and positive impact in healthcare. As CEO and Co-Founder of Abridge AI Inc., Shivdev Rao leads the company in developing advanced AI technology for healthcare documentation, championing solutions that empower clinicians and improve patient engagement at scale. The Abridge AI Inc. leadership team brings together clinical insight, advanced AI research, and operational excellence to pioneer healthcare documentation transformation. Together, the Abridge AI Inc. management team and founders have positioned the company as a leader in healthcare technology.
